title: Riot, why do your Champion VO's keep getting bugs?
body: Why are so many emotes, one-liners, etc, bugging out when you try to use a skin but end up with Classic lines? Shouldn't you be finding a way to stop it from happening in the first place?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is actually due to a larger scale back-end update that we are doing to a lot of audio in the game to make audio easier to work with for our developers, as well as to prevent things like this from happening in the future. TL;DR it's a much needed clean up! 

The issues are occurring with skins who have different lines than the base skin, which is something we're actively working to resolve.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=xuebEwTj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-04T17:15:54.393+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> This is actually due to a larger scale back-end update that we are doing to a lot of audio in the game to make audio easier to work with for our developers, as well as to prevent things like this from happening in the future. TL;DR it's a much needed clean up! 
> 
> The issues are occurring with skins who have different lines than the base skin, which is something we're actively working to resolve.

What exactly is changing?

With the current setup I still haven't found a way to mod my HUD sounds (I have to just delete the entire soundbank file because I can never repack it and get it to work)
Unfortunately, I don't have details on how exactly we're changing the audio set up. Most of it should already be in the build, so the files you're seeing in the client should be the cleaned up one.
